title: Keep Getting an Error When I try To Buy Runes
body:
When I try to purchase runes It keeps telling me i own them all but as the link below says i don't
http://prntscr.com/b8l31r
And then the error on the next link below pops up
http://prntscr.com/b8l2u8

Any suggestions on how to fix this ?

replies.body:
Unbeknown to most people, there is actually a hard cap on the total number of runes (of all tiers) you can have on your account.  If you already hit that cap, then you will consistently get an error every single time you try to purchase a rune.  To get this resolved, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us!  We should be able to clear this up and allow you to purchase whatever new runes you'd like!

let me know if you have any other questions!
